black.content: The CDC just released a statement today that Public Schools will be closed until spring 2021. They are providing additional resources to parents including zoom counseling and _

white: Really having to pee at an inconvenient time.
Crying into your pillow when your partner gives you the "come get me" look.
Having a glass of wine at 10:00 am because you're working from home and trying to homeschool 3 kids who won't stop fighting.
Actually getting to poop in peace.
Stepping on a lego in the dark of night.
Secretly paying the $50 no-show fee out of your personal care fund because you forgot about your kid's checkup.
Zoom parent-teacher conferences in pajama bottoms.
Wearing an adult diaper for a year because you pee when you laugh/sneeze/cough.
Watching your baby sleep because they are just so cute!.
